author: craigmcc
msg: Bring the release notes for milestone 4 up to date with respect to changes

author: craigmcc
msg: Enable per-web-app negotiation of the need for client certificates.
Previously, the SSL socket factory had to be configured globally to
require (or not require) client certificates for *all* apps.  Now, you can
leave the factory configured to not require certificates.  Individual
applications that use CLIENT-CERT authentication will automatically
renegotiate the SSL session (with client certificates required).
If all of your applications require client certificates, it is still
faster to configure the factory to require them -- this avoids the need to
renegotiate on every single session to every app.

author: pierred

This is really weird. Should not be the case.

author: pierred
msg: Take 2 (previous commit crashed in the middle)
Support for new JSP 1.2 PFD feature:
"Added an implicit URI to TLD map for packaged tag libraries. This also provides support
for multiple TLDs inside a single JAR file."
- Enabled the load on startup for jasper
- now uses TagLibrariesGlobal.getLocation() to see if a URI can
- Uses the URI - TLD mappings saved in TagLibrariesGlobal.
